overview: On a hill in the area known as the Tehuacán Biosphere Reserve, in the state of Puebla, Mexico; Leobardo Sánchez works alone in his Onix ambar quarry. It is an intimate portrait of this unique character, who refers us to mythical stories of Hephaestus, god of blacksmiths and craftsmen.
title: Retorno Al Vientre De Ónice
